text: È sempre bello is the fifth studio album by Italian singer-songwriter Coez, released on 29 March 2019 by Undamento. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Italian Albums (FIMI) | 1 |} ==References== Category:2019 albums
